آئی سی ڈی-9 ایک کوڈنگ نظام ہے: What is ICD-9 coding system? ICD-9 coding system

ICD-9-CM is a widely adopted coding system that establishes codes for disease diagnoses and procedures, and is the most widely used coding system of its kind in the world. The system is modeled after the World Health Organization (WHO) International Classification of Diseases (Ninth Revision) (ICD-9).
What is ICD-9 coding system? ICD-9 coding system

The ICD-9-CM consists of: a tabular list containing a numerical list of the disease code numbers in tabular form; an alphabetical index to the disease entries; and. a classification system for surgical, diagnostic, and therapeutic procedures (alphabetic index and tabular list).
آئی سی ڈی-9 طبی بلنگ میں استعمال ہوتا ہے: What is ICD-9 used for? ICD-9 medical billing
